channel.title: Server Status Fooler
channel.description:
[B]Overview[/B]
This is just a little tool I made that simulates a server that never crashes thus fooling [U]all the current[/U] server status checkers.
[B]How it works[/B]
Just edit initialize.bat and change the port you want it to listen on, then register a server using that port and put your real server details on it.
[B]Other info[/B]
This is written in Java and all the source code is provided.
[B]Download: [/B][URL=http://sharecash.org/download.php?id=91139]Here[/URL]
Enjoy 100% uptime ;)

item.title: Server Status Fooler
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“ry60003333, post:6, topic:300513”][quote author=Anthony(Ultimate) link=topic=396778.msg2947956#msg2947956 date=1252322809]
Yup, a socket that simulates an actually server so fooling server status checkers
[/quote]
Moparisthebest’s status page actually logs into the server, and since this just listens for connections, it won’t work on his.[/quote]

Correct. Good try though.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Fooler
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Anthony(Ultimate):

Yup, a socket that simulates an actually server so fooling server status checkers

Moparisthebest’s status page actually logs into the server, and since this just listens for connections, it won’t work on his.
